articles.description: ‘If we break and sustain below the 15,000 level, then a follow through downside of 500 points on the Nifty could be a high probability.
articles.content: If there is any kind of incremental pressure, which the markets would probably signal, one has to watch out for these three-four names because they could probably signal another round of cool off int… [+6870 chars]
